channel.title: CVE Feed for JAL Information Technology Co., Ltd. -- PALLET CONTROL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JAL Information Technology Co., Ltd. -- PALLET CONTROL

item.title: CVE-2020-5538|2024-08-04T08:30:24.604Z -- jal%20information%20technology%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- pallet%20control
item.description: Improper Access Control in PALLET CONTROL Ver. 6.3 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code with the SYSTEM privilege on the computer where PALLET CONTROL is installed via unspecified vectors. PalletControl 7 to 9.1 are not affected by this vulnerability, however under the environment where PLS Management Add-on Module is used, all versions are affected.
